content: अभी [अभि-इ] {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To approach, come or draw near, go up to (with <ab>acc.</ab>) अस्मानत्तुमितोऽभ्येति <ls>Bk. 7. 84.</ls>; <ls>Ki. 2. 54.</ls> {@--2@} To go along or after, follow, serve. {@--3@} ({%a%}) To go into, enter; <ls>Bk. 5. 67</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 75.</ls> ({%b%}) To go over to, reach, arrive at; <ls>Me. 34</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> ({%c%}) To fall to one's share, come to; <ls>Bk. 7. 99.</ls> {@--4@} To get, meet with, fall into, suffer, undergo (said of good or bad things); कार्यं संसिद्धिमभ्येति <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>
